title: COVID-19
description: Learn more about William Osler Health System's response to COVID-19.
cleaned_text: As we work with our teams and health care partners to manage the pressures as a result of the pandemic, we ask for your continued understanding and patience as you may experience longer than normal wait times. Thank you for your ongoing support. Please note that COVID-19 PCR testing for the general public is not available at Osler. Those who test positive on a rapid antigen test do not need to seek confirmatory PCR testing. Individuals needing to be tested for COVID-19 can book appointments at Peel and Etobicoke [community testing centres](https://covid-19.ontario.ca/assessment-centre-locations). Those needing to book COVID-19 vaccination appointments can book appointments at Peel and Etobicoke community vaccine clinics. For a full list of COVID-19 vaccine clinics in our community, please visit [Ontario's COVID-19 vaccine appointment booking portal](https://covid-19.ontario.ca/book-vaccine/). If you have general questions about COVID-19, please call your local public health unit.
